OrgName.entry: CARING AND COPING WITH LOSS IN DEMENTIA SERVICE

Desc.entry: A structured support/training service for unpaid carers of people with dementia. Transport available by arrangement. The aim of the service is to help carers discuss the emotional aspect of caring and to understand associated losses. Areas looked at include loss and change, unburdening feelings about caring, coping skills, future needs and taking care of the carer. The service is free of charge and funded by Sheffield Health and Social Care Trust. Self or any referral.
